div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1967 South Italy, 1969 Burial: c. 280 B.C. (K) Contents: 133+ AR Hyria: 1 st. Neapolis: 3 st. Nola: 1 st. Taras: 64 st. Heracleia: 1 st. Metapontum: 12 st. Poseidonia: 3 st. Thurium: 10 st. Velia: 1 st. Caulonia: 1 st. Croton: 15 st. Disposition: dispersed Information from P. Franke, who has itemized record
